text:
I am working on a java/ jsp application, when i try to to run it it gives me 
this error. The same application, is running on a diff pc. can anybody help me 
out in this...Thanks in advance. Find below the exception stack trace i get

jfarcand@apache.org
text:
Like you said "The same application, is running on a diff pc. can anybody help me 
out in this", this is not a bug and you should not open bug for question. Please
post your questions on tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org.

From:
root cause java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl
 at javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance

seems the machine that is falling is using an XML parser that is not compliant
with JAXP 1.1. Please verify your XML parser.

-- Jeanfrancois
